participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and caring, Emily enjoys connecting with others and sharing stories about her life in the countryside.
participant_1.background: my husband is adopted. i live is a rural farming community. i've a german shepherd dog. i like to watch nhl hockey.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Passionate and outgoing, Jake loves to perform and share his music with people, always looking for inspiration in nature.
participant_2.background: i grew up in the industry. we spent summers ring at national parks. i am a country music singer. my favorite band is rascal flats.
